Recommendations: if funds warrant the university may install additional lighting system repair or replace the defective electric fans
safety and precautionary measures may be printed to be readable and be posted visibly
fire extinguishers are suggested to be placed at conspicuous places for accessibility
it is encouraged that all laboratory rooms and shops may be provided with first aid cabinets with medicines and post antidote charts
the management may schedule a regular conduct of fire and earthquake drill
the department may apply the s principle to put things in order
if possible a laboratory technician may be hired so that the faculty will focus on their instruction functions
the ece department may consider providing a tool room for the different laboratory equipment to give more space for students in performing their laboratory activities
if budget permits the college may consider purchasing additional laboratory equipment to meet the minimum requirements set by the ched
